sqlMap.select:
select s.storeunq, s.cateunq, s.storename, s.storeinfo, s.storerate, m.menuunq, m.menuname, m.menukeyword, m.menuinfo, to_char(m.price,'FM9,999,999') price, decode(m.menuimage,null,'사진',m.menuimage) menuimage from store s, menu m where s.storeunq=m.storeunq and m.storeunq = #storeunq#
and m.menuname LIKE '%$s_text$%'
and m.menukeyword like '$menukeyword$'

SELECT storeunq, storename, decode(storerate,null,'0',storerate) storerate, decode(fee,0,'무료',fee) fee, minprice
from store where storeunq = #storeunq#
SELECT count(*) FROM storereview WHERE storeunq = #storeunq#
select menuunq, menuname, price, storeunq from menu where menuunq= #menuunq#
SELECT count(*) FROM preorder WHERE userid = #userid# AND menuunq = #menuunq#
SELECT pindex, menuunq, menuname, price, qty, userid, storeunq FROM preorder WHERE storeunq = #storeunq# AND userid=#userid#
SELECT nvl(sum(price * qty),0) total FROM preorder WHERE userid = #userid# AND storeunq = #storeunq#
SELECT userid, username, userphone, '('||useraddr4||') '||useraddr5 addr, decode(useraddr6,null,'',useraddr6) useraddr6 FROM member WHERE userid = #userid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO preorder( pindex, menuunq, menuname, price, qty, storeunq, userid) VALUES(preorder_seq.nextval, $menuunq$, #menuname#, #price#, #qty#, #storeunq#, #userid#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE preorder SET qty = qty+1 WHERE menuunq=#menuunq# AND userid = #userid#
